snippet: One obstacle President Obama may face in proposing a new federal ban on assault weapons could lie in the use of the term “assault weapon” itself.
abstract: One obstacle Pres Obama may face in proposing new federal ban on assault weapons could lie in use of term 'assault weapon' itself; label, applied to group of firearms sold on civilian market, has become so politicized in recent decades that where people stand on gun issue can often be deduced by whether they use term.
lead_paragraph: One obstacle President Obama may face in proposing a new federal ban on assault weapons could lie in the use of the term “assault weapon” itself.
